description:
Kon is a modified soul who takes over http://anidb.net/ch2069 [Ichigo]`s physical body when he transforms into a shinigami, but he spends most of the time living as a stuffed toy lion. Kon is an unashamed pervert who likes nothing more than beautiful women, especially if he gets to nuzzle in their breasts. He has very few actual talents and normally acts as the butt of everyone`s jokes, or as a punching bag.
Source: Anime-Planet
name: Kon
